summary: Brief introductions from PM (Sarah), Architect (Mike), Developer (Alex), QA (Jordan), and the client; QA requested a required format for submitting changes for automated testing.

actions.task: When changes are ready for testing, post "Ready for testing!" and include the expected output in quotes so QA can run automated tests.

backlog_deltas.title: Update testing submission process to require posting 'Ready for testing!' with expected output in quotes

risks.risk: Automated tests may not run or may produce false failures if the expected output is not provided with a testing submission.
risks.mitigation: Enforce the submission format; QA to reject or request resubmission for any change that lacks 'Ready for testing!' and the expected output; remind team of the requirement.
